title: The Road
creator_credit: Lee R. Bobker and Vision Associates
brief_description: Presents several hours in a hospital of the Frontier Service in a remote area of Kentucky. The Frontier Service is a privately supported organisation which has an impressive record in public health and offers an example for others to follow.
